flavor: The system is so deeply rooted, who knows how far the cables run?
stripped_text: Whenever the Corp purges virus counters, you may gain 1 credit for each virus counter removed and trash Acacia.
text: Whenever the Corp purges virus counters, you may gain 1[credit] for each virus counter removed and trash Acacia.
title: Acacia

flavor: Embedded in the mainframe, it proliferates and devours with each agitation.
stripped_text: When you install Plague, choose a server. Whenever you make a successful run on the chosen server, you may place 2 virus counters on Plague.
text:
When you install Plague, choose a server.
Whenever you make a successful run on the chosen server, you may place 2 virus counters on Plague.
title: Plague

flavor: The gap of 0.19 seconds was all he needed.
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn. Install a card from your grip, lowering its install cost by 8 credits, and take 1 tag.
text:
Play only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn.
Install a card from your grip, lowering its install cost by 8[credit], and take 1 tag.
title: Credit Kiting

flavor: "He's probably the best pet I've ever had but I'd still trade him for something better." - 419
stripped_text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, you may trash Wari to name sentry, code gate or barrier. Expose a piece of ice, then add it to HQ if it has the named subtype.
text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, you may trash Wari to name sentry, code gate or barrier. Expose a piece of ice, then add it to HQ if it has the named subtype.
title: Wari

stripped_text: click: Search your stack for a non-virus program and install it, lowering its install cost by 1 credit, then shuffle your stack. If that program is still installed when your turn ends, remove it from the game.
text: [click]: Search your stack for a non-virus program and install it, lowering its install cost by 1[credit], then shuffle your stack. If that program is still installed when your turn ends, remove it from the game.
title: Kabonesa Wu: Netspace Thrillseeker

flavor: When standard breaking just doesn't cut it.
stripped_text: Whenever you fully break a piece of ice, you may place 1 power counter on this program. 2 hosted power counters: Choose 1 installed non-AI icebreaker. That icebreaker gets +3 strength for the remainder of the current encounter.
text: Whenever you fully break a piece of ice, you may place 1 power counter on this program. 2 hosted power counters: Choose 1 installed non-AI icebreaker. That icebreaker gets +3 strength for the remainder of the current encounter.
title: Takobi

flavor: A winged terror, the Kongamato dives from above, rending its prey in one ferocious bite.
stripped_text: trash: Break the first subroutine on the encountered piece of ice.
text: [trash]: Break the first subroutine on the encountered piece of ice.
title: Kongamato

stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Trash any number of programs and/or pieces of hardware from your grip. Search your stack for 1 program or piece of hardware. Install it, paying X credits less. X is equal to the total install cost of the trashed cards.
text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Trash any number of programs and/or pieces of hardware from your grip. Search your stack for 1 program or piece of hardware. Install it, paying X[credit] less. X is equal to the total install cost of the trashed cards.
title: Emergent Creativity

stripped_text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ or R&D each turn, you may name a number. If you do, reveal the next card that you access this run. If it has a rez cost, play cost, or advancement requirement equal to the named number, either gain 3 credits or draw 2 cards.
text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ or R&D each turn, you may name a number. If you do, reveal the next card that you access this run. If it has a rez cost, play cost, or advancement requirement equal to the named number, either gain 3[credit] or draw 2 cards.
title: RNG Key

flavor: Witchcraft to the nescient; beauty to the wise.
stripped_text: Subroutine The Runner loses click, if able. You have an additional click to spend during your next turn. Subroutine The Runner loses click, if able. You have an additional click to spend during your next turn.
text:
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able. You have an additional [click] to spend during your next turn.
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able. You have an additional [click] to spend during your next turn.
title: Nightdancer

flavor: "The site of the world's second beanstalk, or I'll die trying." - Miria Byanyima, Director of VSEP
stripped_text: Whenever you draw a piece of ice, you may reveal it and install it protecting this server, paying 4 credits less. Limit 1 region per server.
text: Whenever you draw a piece of ice, you may reveal it and install it protecting this server, paying 4[credit] less. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Jinja City Grid

flavor: "Starving, dehydrated, delirious, I picked a direction and ran, ran for days, maybe even weeks. I ran until my legs couldn't carry me. Then I crawled. When I was finally out, finally free of the shroud, I checked the time, the date. How long had I been gone, trapped in the all-encompassing blackness? Turns out, 3 minutes."
stripped_text: Subroutine Trash the top 3 cards of the stack. Trash Aimor.
text: [subroutine] Trash the top 3 cards of the stack. Trash Aimor.
title: Aimor

stripped_text: When Bacterial Programming is scored or stolen, you may look at the top 7 cards of R&D, add any number of them to HQ, trash any number of them, and arrange the rest in any order.
text: When Bacterial Programming is scored or stolen, you may look at the top 7 cards of R&D, add any number of them to HQ, trash any number of them, and arrange the rest in any order.
title: Bacterial Programming

flavor: "It wasn't until the spots cleared that I realized half of my rig was gone." - Kabonesa Wu
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters Jua, he or she cannot install cards for the remainder of the turn. Subroutine Choose 2 installed Runner cards, if able. The Runner must add 1 of those cards to the top of the stack.
text:
When the Runner encounters Jua, he or she cannot install cards for the remainder of the turn.
[subroutine] Choose 2 installed Runner cards, if able. The Runner must add 1 of those cards to the top of the stack.
title: Jua

stripped_text: Play only if the Runner trashed at least 1 Corp card during his or her last turn. Choose an installed Runner card. The Runner must either add that card to the top of the stack or take 2 tags. Remove Threat Assessment from the game instead of trashing it.
text:
Play only if the Runner trashed at least 1 Corp card during his or her last turn.
Choose an installed Runner card. The Runner must either add that card to the top of the stack or take 2 tags. Remove Threat Assessment from the game instead of trashing it.
title: Threat Assessment

flavor: He found it odd that three frozen yogurt shops, all less than a block from his, opened within the same week.
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during his or her last turn. The Runner loses 4 credits, if able.
text:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during his or her last turn.
The Runner loses 4[credit], if able.
title: Economic Warfare

stripped_text: If Forced Connection is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Forced Connection, trace 3 If successful, give the Runner 2 tags. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Forced Connection from Archives.
text:
If Forced Connection is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Forced Connection, <trace>trace 3</trace> If successful, give the Runner 2 tags. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Forced Connection from Archives.
title: Forced Connection

stripped_text: When SSL Endorsement is scored or stolen, place 9 credits from the bank on it. When the Corp's turn begins, he or she may take 3 credits from SSL Endorsement. This ability is active even while SSL Endorsement is in the Runner's score area.
text:
When SSL Endorsement is scored or stolen, place 9[credit] from the bank on it.
When the Corp's turn begins, he or she may take 3[credit] from SSL Endorsement. This ability is active even while SSL Endorsement is in the Runner's score area.
title: SSL Endorsement

flavor: "Who knew non-profits could be so profitable?"
stripped_text: NGO Front can be advanced. trash,1 hosted advancement token: Gain 5 credits. trash,2 hosted advancement tokens: Gain 8 credits.
text: NGO Front can be advanced. [trash],1 hosted advancement token: Gain 5[credit]. [trash],2 hosted advancement tokens: Gain 8[credit].
title: NGO Front

flavor: "Food. Drinks. Entertainment. It doesn't take much to gratify the bourgeoisie."
stripped_text: The Runner gains 2 credits. Trash up to 2 cards from HQ, then shuffle up to 2 cards from Archives into R&D. Remove Distract the Masses from the game instead of trashing it.
text: The Runner gains 2[credit]. Trash up to 2 cards from HQ, then shuffle up to 2 cards from Archives into R&D. Remove Distract the Masses from the game instead of trashing it.
title: Distract the Masses
